titles.title: To require the Postmaster General to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities, and for other purposes.
To require the Postmaster General to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill requires the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for the communities of Flanders, Northampton, and Riverside in the Town of Southampton, New York.
